Transform any room with perfect lighting control. This mini dimmer brings professional ambiance to your fingertips.

• Set the ideal mood from bright productivity to romantic dimness.
• Control two separate lighting zones independently from one switch.
• Smooth dimming creates stunning visual effects without flickering.
• Compact design fits standard boxes, no neutral wire required.

Connect to your smart speakers and voice assistants for hands-free control. Adjust brightness from your mobile devices anywhere in your home.

Experience lighting that adapts to every moment of your life.
products.keywords: zigbee dimmer, smart dimmer switch, 2 channel dimmer, mini light dimmer, zigbee 3.0 switch, wireless dimmer, dual channel dimmer, ac dimmer switch, smart lighting controller
automations: Evening scene dims living room lights to 30% at sunset via Zigbee schedule for cozy ambiance
Midnight automation fades bedroom lights from 80% to 10% over 30 minutes for gentle sleep transition
Morning routine gradually increases kitchen lights from 0% to 100% between 6-7 AM via Zigbee timer
connected_scenes: Dims lights automatically when battery-powered video doorbell rings to reduce glare on smart displays showing visitor feed
Adjusts both lighting channels independently based on outdoor camera motion detection for enhanced security illumination
Coordinates with indoor camera's night vision mode by gradually dimming lights during evening hours for optimal recording
